mapper.update: update member set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=BIT}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, username, password, nickname, avatar, email, mobile, gender, birthday, status, gmt_create, gmt_modified from member where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, username, password, nickname, avatar, email, mobile, gender, birthday, status, gmt_create, gmt_modified from member
